arts.ttl: Man Utd news: Erik ten Hag scoffs at Marcus Rashford suggestion as star accused
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford started on the bench during Manchester United's 0-0 draw away to Crystal Palace on Saturday, with the forward unable to make an impact as a second-half substitute

arts.ttl: 'He's a key player for us' - Andre Onana names Man United teammate who could make the difference
arts.sum: Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana was understandably frustrated after the 0-0 draw at Crystal Palace - but was pleased with one particular aspect of the game.

arts.ttl: Why Manchester United substitutes failed to have an impact vs Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Man United enjoyed one of their most dominant halves under Erik ten Hag at Crystal Palace but struggled after the interval.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 0-0 Man Utd: Player ratings as dominant Red Devils held to draw
arts.sum: Alejandro Garnacho was played in behind by Joshua Zirkzee but former United man Dean Henderson was equal to his low effort, palming the ball away from danger. Fernandes' low cross caused all sorts of problems and Henderson had to turn a flick from Zirkzee round his post as Garnacho dived in to try and get the touch needed to convert, with United struggling to turn their dominance into goals.

arts.ttl: Why did Man United's Lisandro Martinez escape red card in Crystal Palace stalemate?
arts.sum: The Premier League explain why Lisandro Martinez was not sent off for his challenge on Daichi Kamada in Manchester United's goalless draw with Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Man Utd chase 'DINOSAUR', Gyokeres release SHOCK, Osimhen ANSWERS Mourinho
arts.sum: Man Utd chase 'DINOSAUR', Gyokeres release SHOCK, Osimhen ANSWERS Mourinho – FootballTransfers recap The Premier League kicked off with Jadon Sancho helping Chelsea to a 3-0 win and ended with Manchester United claiming a point against Crystal Palace, with wins in between for Aston Villa, Fulham, Liverpool and Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Lisandro Martinez accused of 'fighting' Man Utd opponent moments after horror tackle
arts.sum: Manchester United centre-back Lisandro Martinez was booked after a two-footed tackle on Crystal Palace's Daichi Kamada and another lucky escape followed for the ex-Ajax man

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag's humiliating record continues as Man Utd risk fails to pay off
arts.sum: Manchester United were held to a goalless draw by Crystal Palace on Saturday, extending an unwanted record for embattled manager Erik ten Hag, who chose to bench the in-form Marcus Rashford

arts.ttl: Patrick Vieira agrees with Erik ten Hag as he wades in on Marcus Rashford saga
arts.sum: Manchester United were held to a goalless draw by Patrick Vieira's former club Crystal Palace after Erik ten Hag left Marcus Rashford out of the starting line-up

arts.ttl: Ten Hag 'happy' with Rashford after Redknapp questions Palace omission
arts.sum: Erik ten Hag has defended his decision to drop Marcus Rashford after Sky Sports’ Jamie Redknapp criticised the call for Man Utd’s draw at Crystal Palace.
